requestParams.name: check_order_status
requestParams.desc: 盘点单状态（CHECKING(1, "盘点中"), DONE(2, "已完成"), CANCEL(3, "已作废")）

requestParams.name: order_type
requestParams.desc: 单据类型  1, "库存盘点单" 2, "采购入库单"  3, "退货入库单"  4, "出库单"  5,"成本改价"  与order_types必须有一个

requestParams.name: order_types
requestParams.example: 2和3表示查采购和退货入库单
requestParams.desc: 单据类型集合（入库聚合）

requestParams.name: source
requestParams.desc: 请求来源（需调用方自定义标识：OPEN_XXXX）

requestParams.name: stock_in_type
requestParams.desc: 入库单据详细类型  21:采购入库  22:调拨入库   31 退货入库

requestParams.name: stock_out_types
requestParams.desc: 出库单详细类型  41:网店出库  42:门店出库   43:其它出库-报损  44:其它出库-领用  49：其它出库-其他

requestParams.name: warehouse_ids
requestParams.desc: 门店或独立仓id   连锁版使用此字段,若不传,会默认查下面所有仓库的单据

'[23502018,23602001]', 'source' => 'test', 'page_size' => '20', 'page_no' => '1', 'order_type' => '4', ]; $my_files = [ ]; echo '
';
var_dump(
    $client->post($method, $api_version, $my_params, $my_files)
);

';

token = auth.Token(token='token') #auth.Sign(app_id='app_id', app_secret='app_secret')

client = YZClient(token)

params={}

params['warehouse_ids']="[23502018,23602001]"
params['source']="test"
params['page_size']=20
params['page_no']=1
params['order_type']=4

files=[]

print client.invoke('youzan.retail.stock.bizorder.search', '3.0.0', 'POST', params=params, files=files)
